Biography of the singer Vendrell
The plagiarist has warned me via email that he copy my site on his blog
see  
below and also he re-posting what Google takes off. I have emailed Blogger
 
every time he does it.
Email from the plagiarist
======================
Ashot Arakelyan
	
1:24 AM (3 hours ago)
		
to me

Bravo Franco, are you Sherlock Holmes? How did you get my IPs? Francois I 

wish you could work in Police. Hahahahaha

A bay the way I continue to transfer your site into my blog

All the best

Ashot
